cards.title: Wildfire
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero deals a target 3 Fire damage.
Select a hero. Until the start of your next turn, whenever that hero uses a power, that player's hero deals a target 1 Fire damage.
One hero may use a power.

cards.title: Conflagration Rod
cards.powers: Discard the top card of your deck. If it is an Elemental, put it into play. If no cards entered play this way, {Wildfire} deals each non-hero target 1 Fire damage.

cards.title: Bonfire Circlet
cards.powers: Search your deck or trash for an Elemental and put it into play. If you searched your deck, shuffle it afterwards.

cards.title: Combustion Staff
cards.powers: Increase damage dealt by Elementals in your play area by 1 until the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Power Explosion
cards.body: The first time you use a power on a Focus each turn, {Wildfire} may deal herself 2 Fire damage. If {Wildfire} took damage this way, you may use a power now.
cards.powers: Discard two cards. Search your deck for a Focus and put it into play. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

cards.title: Controlled Burn
cards.body: {Wildfire} either deals one target 4 Fire damage, or deals up to three targets 2 Fire damage each.

cards.title: Elemental Wrath
body: Each Elemental in your play area deals a target 1 Fire damage.

cards.title: Scorched Earth
body: {Wildfire} deals each non-hero target 2 Fire damage.

cards.title: Inferno Wisp
body: The first time each turn that {Wildfire} deals a target 2 or more Fire damage at once, increase the next damage dealt by this card by 1.
At the end of your turn, this card deals a target 1 Fire damage.

cards.title: Everburning Phoenix
body: At the end of your turn, this card deals a target 2 Fire damage.
At the start of your turn, if this card has less than 5 HP, set its HP to 5.

cards.title: Blazing Bunny
body: At the end of your turn, you may put a Blazing Bunny from your hand into play.
At the start of your turn, this card deals a target X Fire damage, where X is the number of Blazing Bunnys in play. Then, shuffle this card into your deck.

cards.title: Smoldering Salamander
body: When this card is destroyed, you may draw a card.
At the end of your turn, this card deals a target 2 Fire damage.

cards.title: Incinerating Drake
body: When this card is destroyed, you may put an Elemental from your trash into play.
At the end of your turn, this card deals a target X Fire damage, where X is the number of Elementals in your play area plus 1.
